data.title: The Best Actors of British Tv Series All Time
data.text:
Who is the Best Actor of British Tv Series All Time?

There are (or were) a lot of popular Tv Series in UK Televisions. Some of you liked these series because of outstanding performance of actors in a leading role. We decide to choose the best Actors of British Tv Series ever according to your votes. This list is composed of the best actors from British Tv Series of all time (2000â€™s and later).

These are our candidates: Adrian Dunbar (Line of Duty), Aidan Turner (Poldark-Leonardo), Alexander Dreymon (The Last Kingdom), Amir Wilson (His Dark Materials), Ben Whishaw (This Is Going to Hurt), Benedict Cumberbatch (Sherlock), Bradley James (Merlin), Christopher Eccleston (Doctor Who), Cillian Murphy (Peaky Blinders), Colin Morgan (Merlin-Humans), David Dawson (The Last Kingdom), David Tennant (Broadchurch-Doctor Who), Douglas Henshall (Shetland), Howard Charles (The Musketeers), Hugh Grant (A Very English Scandal), Hugh Laurie (The Night Manager), Idris Elba (Luther), James Norton (McMafia-War & Peace), Jamie Dornan (The Fall), Mark Strong (Deep State), Martin Freeman (Sherlock), Matt Smith (Doctor Who-The Crown), Matthew Goode (A Discovery of Witches), Nicholas Hoult (Skins), Paul Anderson (Peaky Blinders), Paul Dano (War & Peace), Peter Capaldi (Doctor Who), Philip Winchester (Strike Back), Richard Armitage (Stay Close-The Stranger), Richard Madden (Bodyguard), Richard Wilson (Merlin), Rob Delaney (Catastrophe), Russell Tovey (Being Human), Santiago Cabrera (The Musketeers), Shaun Evans (Endeavour), Sullivan Stapleton (Strike Back), Tahar Rahim (The Serpent), Tobias Menzies (The Crown), Toby Regbo (The Last Kingdom), Tom Burke (The Musketeers-Strike), Tom Hardy (Taboo), Tom Hiddleston (The Night Manager), Tom Hughes (Victoria).

Choose your favorite one and vote! If your favorite actor is not take place in our list, we can add him according to your comments above our post.
